statements: UPDATE content_metadata SET content_name='New Content 1', is_published=true WHERE content_id='a1b2c3';

UPDATE UserProgress SET progress_percentage = 75.50, last_accessed = '2022-09-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = '1c0f3a77-4d45-4343-bc1e-6d1ae9e6a46f' AND content_id = 'd46e0323-375c-4f7e-8d2e-ff3505b79a9b';
